00016 //@name Defines
00018 
00019 #define NUM_WORDS               100
00020 #define MAX_LENGTH              1024
00021 #define MAX_FILENAME    128
00022 
00024 #define PARSCMD                 0
00025 #define PARSNEXT                1
00026 #define PARSPARAM               2
00027 #define PARSRIN                 3
00028 #define PARSROUT                4
00029 #define PARSTWO                 5
00030 #define PARSRERR                6
00031 #define PARSFILENAME    7
00032 #define PARSSUCCESS             8
00033 #define PARSFAIL                9
00034 
00035 
00039 class Parser {
00041         private:
00042                 int             currState; //Estado atual
00043                 Job*    job; //Ponteiro para o job que sera devolvido
00044                 char**  cmdList; //Matriz de comandos
00045                 int             cmdListSize; //Tamanho da matriz de comandos
00046                 int             currChar; //Indice do caracter atual
00047                 char    line[MAX_LENGTH]; //Linha de comando
00048                 char    filename[MAX_FILENAME]; //Nome de arquivo de redirecionamento
00049 
00050                 void initialize (void); //Funcao que inicializa o parser
00051                 void newWord (void); //Funcao que inicia uma nova palavra na matriz de comandos
00052                 void endWord (void); //Funcao que termina uma palavra da matriz de comandos
00053                 void newProcess (void); //Funcao que cria um novo processo no job
00054                 void endProcess (void); //Funcao que termina a criacao do processo no job
00055 
00056         public:
00057                 Parser (void);
00063                 Job* parseLine (void);
00065 };
00066 
00067 void Parser::initialize (void) {
00068         cmdListSize = -1;
00069         currChar = 0;
00070         cmdList = (char**) malloc (sizeof(char*)*NUM_WORDS);
00071 }
00072 void Parser::newWord (void) {
00073         cmdList[++cmdListSize] = (char*)malloc(sizeof(char)*MAX_LENGTH);
00074         currChar = 0;
00075 }
00076 void Parser::endWord (void) {
00077         cmdList[cmdListSize][currChar] = '\0';
00078 }
00079 void Parser::newProcess (void) {
00080         initialize();
00081         job->createProcess();
00082 }
00083 void Parser::endProcess (void) {
00084         cmdList[++cmdListSize] = (char*)NULL;
00085         job->setProcessCommand (cmdList, cmdListSize);
00086 }
00087 
00088 Parser::Parser (void) {
00089 }
00090 
00091 Job* Parser::parseLine (void) {
00092         job = new Job();
00093         currState = PARSCMD;
00094         int i, length, curr;
00095         int rflag;
00096         
00097         // Limpa o buffer de entrada para evitar loop infinito
00098         strcpy(line, "\0");
00099         std::cin.clear();
00100         
00101         std::cin.getline (line, MAX_LENGTH);
00102         
00103         i = 0;
00104         while (i < length && line[i] == ' ')    i++;
00105         length = strlen(line+i);
00106         // Checa se a linha nao estava em branco
00107         if (length == 0) {
00108                 job->addFlag (shooSH_NOP);
00109                 return job;
00110         } else {
00111                 while (line[--length] == ' '); // pega os espacos do fim
00112                 length++;
00113                 if (strcmp (line+i, "exit") == 0) { //builtin
00114                         job->addFlag (shooSH_EXIT);
00115                         return job;
00116                 }
00117         }
00118         if ((line+i)[length-1] == '&')
00119                 job->setCommand (std::string (line+i, length-1));
00120         else
00121                 job->setCommand (std::string (line+i, length));
00122                 
00123         while (currState != PARSSUCCESS && currState != PARSFAIL) {
00124                 if (currState == PARSCMD) {
00125                         newProcess();
00126                         newWord();
00127                         rflag = 0;
00128                         // pega espacos
00129                         while (i < length && line[i] == ' ')    i++;
00130                         // esperava um comando, mas nao veio nada (usado para pipe)
00131                         if (i == length) {
00132                                 currState = PARSFAIL;
00133                         } else {
00134                                 // le ate encontrar um espaco
00135                                 while (i < length && line[i] != ' ')    cmdList[cmdListSize][currChar++] = line[i++];
00136                                 currState = PARSNEXT;
00137                         }
00138                         endWord();
00139                 } else if (currState == PARSNEXT) {
00140                         // le espaco
00141                         while (i < length && line[i] == ' ')    i++;
00142         
00143                         if (i == length) { //chegou ao fim da linha
00144                                 currState = PARSSUCCESS;
00145                                 endProcess();
00146                         } else {
00147                                 // procura token
00148                                 switch (line[i]) {
00149                                         case '<':
00150                                                 i++;
00151                                                 currState = PARSRIN;
00152                                                 break;
00153                                         case '>':
00154                                                 i++;
00155                                                 currState = PARSROUT;
00156                                                 break;
00157                                         case '2': //pode ser argumento ou redirecionamento de erro
00158                                                 i++;
00159                                                 currState = PARSTWO;
00160                                                 break;
00161                                         case '|':
00162                                                 i++;
00163                                                 job->addFlag (shooSH_PIPE);
00164                                                 endProcess();
00165                                                 currState = PARSCMD;
00166                                                 break;
00167                                         case '&':
00168                                                 i++;
00169                                                 job->addFlag (shooSH_BG);
00170                                                 endProcess();
00171                                                 currState = PARSSUCCESS;
00172                                                 break;
00173                                         default:
00174                                                 currState = PARSPARAM;
00175                                 }
00176                         }
00177                 } else if (currState == PARSPARAM) {
00178                         newWord();
00179                         while (i < length && line[i] != ' ' && line[i] != '\"' && line[i] != '\'')      cmdList[cmdListSize][currChar++] = line[i++];
00180                         if (line[i] == '\"') {
00181                                 i++;
00182                                 while (i < length && line[i] != '\"')   cmdList[cmdListSize][currChar++] = line[i++];
00183                                 if (i == length) {
00184                                         endWord();
00185                                         currState = PARSFAIL;
00186                                 } else {
00187                                         i++;
00188                                         endWord();
00189                                         currState = PARSNEXT;
00190                                 }
00191                         } else if (line[i] == '\'') {
00192                                 i++;
00193                                 while (i < length && line[i] != '\'')   cmdList[cmdListSize][currChar++] = line[i++];
00194                                 if (i == length) {
00195                                         endWord();
00196                                         currState = PARSFAIL;
00197                                 } else {
00198                                         i++;
00199                                         endWord();
00200                                         currState = PARSNEXT;
00201                                 }
00202                         } else {
00203                                 endWord();
00204                                 currState = PARSNEXT;
00205                         }
00206                 } else if (currState == PARSTWO) {
00207                         if (line[i] == '>') {
00208                                 i++;
00209                                 endWord();
00210                                 currState = PARSRERR;
00211                         } else {
00212                                 i--;
00213                                 currState = PARSPARAM;
00214                         }
00215                         endWord();
00216                 } else if (currState == PARSRERR) {
00217                         if (line[i] == '>') { // append
00218                                 i++;
00219                                 rflag = REDERRA;
00220                         } else { // trunc
00221                                 rflag = REDERRT;
00222                         }
00223                         currState = PARSFILENAME;
00224                 } else if (currState == PARSRIN) {
00225                         rflag = REDIN;
00226                         currState = PARSFILENAME;
00227                 } else if (currState == PARSROUT) {
00228                         if (line[i] == '>') { // append
00229                                 i++;
00230                                 rflag = REDOUTA;
00231                         } else { // trunc
00232                                 rflag = REDOUTT;
00233                         }
00234                         currState = PARSFILENAME;
00235                 } else if (currState == PARSFILENAME) {
00236                         while (i < length && line[i] == ' ')    i++;
00237                         if (i == length)        currState = PARSFAIL;
00238                         else {
00239                                 curr = 0;
00240                                 if (line[i] == '"') { // le nomes como "file name"
00241                                         i++;
00242                                         while (i < length && line[i] != '"')    filename[curr++] = line[i++];
00243                                         if (i == length)        currState = PARSFAIL;
00244                                         else    i++;
00245                                 } else if (line[i] == '\'') { // le nomes do tipo 'file name'
00246                                         i++;
00247                                         while (i < length && line[i] != '\'')   filename[curr++] = line[i++];
00248                                         if (i == length)        currState = PARSFAIL;
00249                                         else    i++;
00250                                 } else { // le nomes do tipo filename
00251                                         while (i < length && line[i] != ' ')    filename[curr++] = line[i++];
00252                                 }
00253                                 filename[curr] = '\0';
00254                                 job->setProcessFile (filename, rflag);
00255                                 currState = PARSNEXT;
00256                         }
00257                 }
00258         }
00259         if (currState == PARSFAIL)      job->addFlag (shooSH_FAIL);
00260         return job;
00261 }
